p: A total of two cases of MAYV have been found in Mexico. These cases were identified in 2001, when 35 patients at the Mexican Institute of Social Security in the state of Veracruz underwent testing for MAYV ( 27). Two of the patients tested positive for the virus and displayed symptoms characteristic of hemorrhagic cases ( 27). Of the two cases, one patient died ( 27). This has been the only recorded case of fatality due to MAYV ( 27).
